Meanwhile, Jeff Bezos made headlines with a record $500 million investment in a superyacht, showcasing his continued wealth and influence.

candidates.news_summary: Citigroup has announced a significant leadership reorganization, appointing Gonzalo Luchetti as CFO starting March 2026, while consolidating its Retail Bank into the Wealth business. This restructuring aims to enhance operational efficiency under CEO Jane Fraser's direction. Additionally, current CFO Mark Mason will transition to an executive vice chair role, indicating a strategic shift in the bank's management structure. These changes reflect Citi's ongoing efforts to streamline operations and strengthen its wealth management division.
